name: rsshub
description: RSSHub is a powerful self-hosted RSS generator that fetches content from virtually any site using custom scrapers. It offers modular routes and integrations for personalized feed tracking.
features: Universal feed generation: Create RSS feeds from thousands of websites using custom routes.
Modular architecture: Add new feed sources by writing simple route modules.
Social media support: Generate feeds from Twitter, Instagram, Reddit, and other platforms.
News aggregation: Follow news sites, blogs, and publications without native RSS.
Content extraction: Parse and clean article content for distraction-free reading.
Multimedia feeds: Track YouTube channels, podcasts, and video platforms.
E-commerce monitoring: Follow product updates and price changes on shopping sites.
Developer tools: Track GitHub releases, commits, and issues via RSS.
Caching system: Store generated feeds to improve performance and reduce scraping load.
Authentication support: Access feeds from sites requiring login credentials.
Custom parameters: Filter and customize feeds using URL query parameters.
API documentation: Browse comprehensive docs for all available routes and options.
